mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer},updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyerdate, updatedate from ( select /*+INDEX(tbl_reply idx_reply) */ rownum rn, rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyerDate, updatedate from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} and rno > 0 and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
